1455930.name: BringIT to MOM
1455930.description:
When MOM needs help, transform yourself and go on a journey.

Begin ILL’s adventure. Help MOM to recover and save your planet. Find out two endings of the story. Go through 50 different escape rooms. Use a rope, roll, jump, fly, dive, bounce, collect galaxies and energy. MOM needs more energy. Bring it to her.

What’s waiting for you:
– an interesting adventure and arcade game scenario,
– 2 different endings,
– 50 levels,
– surprising extra escape rooms,
– great fun for hours,
– an ending that you agree with?!
1455930.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
